summary: This is a calendar entry for a planning/coordination meeting between the FBI and the Southern District of New York (SDNY) to discuss the arrest plan for Jeffrey Epstein. The meeting was scheduled for July 1, 2019, indicating advanced operational planning prior to his arrest.

events.title: Planning/Coordination Meeting for Epstein Arrest
events.description: A meeting scheduled between the FBI and the Southern District of New York (SDNY) to discuss the arrest plan for Jeffrey Epstein and ensure all parties are coordinated.

keyFacts: A coordination meeting between the FBI and SDNY regarding Jeffrey Epstein's arrest was scheduled for July 1, 2019.
The meeting's purpose was to discuss the arrest plan and ensure all parties were aligned.
The calendar entry was created on June 27, 2019, showing advanced planning for the operation.
The document is a calendar entry classified as 'X-PERSONAL' with a high priority (5).
The meeting was planned to last 30 minutes, from 7:30 PM to 8:00 PM.
